name: color
description: Applies specified color to the control - it can be the name of material color (for example success or purple) or css color (#033 or rgba(255, 0, 0, 0.5)). You can find list of built in classes on the colors page.

name: dark
description: Applies the dark theme variant to the component. You can find more information on the Material Design documentation for dark themes.

name: elevation
description: Designates an elevation applied to the component between 0 and 24. You can find more information on the elevation page.

name: height
description: Sets the height for the component.

name: light
description: Applies the light theme variant to the component.

name: max-height
description: Sets the maximum height for the component.

name: max-width
description: Sets the maximum width for the component.

name: min-height
description: Sets the minimum height for the component.

name: min-width
description: Sets the minimum width for the component.

name: mobile-break-point
description: Sets the designated mobile breakpoint for the component. This will apply alternate styles for mobile devices.

name: single-line
description: Forces the banner onto a single line.

name: sticky
description: Applies position: sticky to the component (Evergreen browsers only). You can find more information on the MDN documentation for sticky position.

name: tag
description: Specify a custom tag used on the root element.

name: value
description: Controls whether the component is visible or hidden.

name: width
description: Sets the width for the component.
